short_summary: request for installation of new monitors in House of Commons
description: PWGSC requires installation of new monitors in the House of Commons.  Installation will be done by General Contractor and Specialty Trades Services.
full_summary:
### West Block Monitors Tender Announcement

**Reference:** WS4530976460-Doc4530992220
**Solicitation:** WS4530976460
**Publication Date:** April 10, 2024
**Closing Date:** April 22, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
**Amendment:** The tender documents have undergone 4 revisions.

**Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a formal Request for Proposal (RFP) for the installation of new monitors in the House of Commons. This procurement is restricted to Holders of Supply Arrangement EP938-232165 or suppliers who have expressed an interest in becoming qualified suppliers.

**Tender Process:**
To participate in this RFP, interested suppliers must be registered on the SAP Ariba platform and hold a valid contract with the government. Suppliers who are not registered can follow the link to register:

*   [Registration](https://canadabuys.gc.ca/)

**RFP Documents:**
To access the full RFP documents, including terms and conditions, please follow this link:

*   [RFSA General Contractor and Specialty Trades Services - Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.gc.ca/)

**Important Dates:**
*   Tender Closing Date: April 22, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: April 22, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: April 23, 2024

**Classification and Trade Agreements:**
This RFP adheres to the standards set forth in the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Other:**
For detailed information or to clarify any aspect of this RFP, please
